tool.name: Fasta to Phylip
tool.description: Convert fasta alignment file into phylip interleaved format with goalign
tool.help:
=========== Overview: ===========
Convert **Fasta** alignment file into **Phylip** interleave format with Goalign\*
Note: - First and Last spaces and tabs are removed from sequence names - Internal spaces and tabs in sequence names are replaced by "_"
\*Author: Frederic Lemoine
Goalign_ on Github
.. _Goalign: https://github.com/fredericlemoine/goalign
